title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\HumanAgentAssistantConfig\SuggestionQueryConfig\ContextFilterSettings
name: ContextFilterSettings
description:
Settings that determine how to filter recent conversation context when generating suggestions.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.HumanAgentAssistantConfig.SuggestionQueryConfig.ContextFilterSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.drop_handoff_messages
params.description: If set to true, the last message from virtual agent (hand off message) and the message before it (trigger message of hand off) are dropped.

params.name: data.drop_virtual_agent_messages
params.description: If set to true, all messages from virtual agent are dropped.

params.name: data.drop_ivr_messages
params.description: If set to true, all messages from ivr stage are dropped.
